name: NSPersistentCloudKitContainerSchemaInitializationOptions
desc: Options that control the behavior when promoting the container’s schema to CloudKit.

items.name: static var dryRun: NSPersistentCloudKitContainerSchemaInitializationOptions
items.desc: A flag that indicates the container validates the model and generates the records, but doesn’t upload them to CloudKit.

items.name: static var printSchema: NSPersistentCloudKitContainerSchemaInitializationOptions
items.desc: Prints the generated records to the console.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates the schema initialization options using the specified raw value.
